HunyuanModelLoader: Load HunyuanVideo-Foley main diffusion model with precision/FP8 options
HunyuanDependenciesLoader: Load DAC-VAE, SigLIP2, Synchformer, and CLAP dependencies
HunyuanFoleySampler: Generate Foley audio (ping-pong memory, fast CFG, optional FP8)
HunyuanFoleyTorchCompile: Optional torch.compile accelerator (~30% faster after first compile)
SelectAudioFromBatch: Pick one waveform from an AUDIO batch
